body.name: Rectangular Wall Mirror Framed Wall Mirror 16” x 20” for Bathroom, Living Room, Vanity, White
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 7 mins
features: PREMIUM MATERIALS: Our 16"x20" wall mirror is made of high quality polystyrene frame, upgraded no-distortion HD mirror offers a crystal-clear reflection
IDEAL SIZE: Including the frame, the dimensions of this mirror are 16"x20" and the inner glass measures 13.64"x17.64". The frame molding is made from polystyrene and measures 1.18" wide x 0.63" deep
DURABLE AND SAFE: Our wall mirror absolutely safety guaranteed with explosion-proof membrane, which even impacted by external force, the glass will not be spilled out, safer and more protective

READY TO HANG: This hanging wall mirror comes with pre-installed hooks on the back. It can be hung vertically and horizontally. Suitable for living room, vanity or just put it on the desk to add light and enhance the beauty of any room in your home instantly
100% SATISFACTION SERVICE: In case any problem or you are not satisfied, please feel free to contact us. Our service team would be so glad to help with a satisfactory solution
body.description: Rectangular Wall Mirror Our wall mirror is handcrafted with care. We use premium polystyrene frame and sliver float glass to the safety and aesthetic beauty of the mirror. As you might have already realized, shape plays an important role in defining any space. Rectangular mirrors are suitable for living room, bedroom, hallway and other home decoration. Overall Size: 16x20 inches Mirror Size: 13.64x17.64 inches Thickness: 0.63 inch Color: White Weight: 4.1 pounds

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: At BOMINICA, we truly believe everyone deserves a better life. So, we've made it our goal to serve each and every person by offering a beautiful and practical mirror. Rectangular Wall Mirror Our wall mirror is handcrafted with care. We use premium polystyrene frame and sliver float glass to the safety and aesthetic beauty of the mirror. As you might have already realized, shape plays an important role in defining any space. Rectangular mirrors are suitable for living room, bedroom, hallway and other home decoration. Overall Size: 16x20 inches Mirror Size: 13.64x17.64 inches Thickness: 0.63 inch Color: White Weight: 4.1 pounds

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what we needed
reviews.reviewText: We use this mirror in a barber shop to show the finished cut so it is not mounted. It is the perfect size and is a great mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for our half bath
reviews.reviewText: Just right for a nice plain mirror with no cabinet, in a half bath. Good price and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I needed.
reviews.reviewText: The mirror arrived undamaged and already had the clips to mount it either vertically or horizontally installed on the corners. Easily installed and is just fine for our spare bathroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars First One Broke
reviews.reviewText: This is my second mirror from them. The first one broke across the middle of the mirror. I"m pretty sure I did it, but I don't know how.The mounting system is four screws (you need two) with screw anchors. The back of the mirror has metal toothed "cleats" attached, they rest on the heads of the screws.We have a similar one in our upstairs bath, but it's slightly larger. It mounts like a picture frame--a wire from one side to another, goes through a traditional picture hangar. I'd prefer that style. If I knew where it came from, I would have tried to order another, but it's been too long. This one is proportional to the space that it's going into, so it's OK. It looks nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality mirror.
reviews.reviewText: I can’t review it as I returned it, it was too small for my space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This mirror contained gaps between mirror and frame with gobs of glue exposed as shown in the photos we didn’t notice the poor condition while it was enclosed in plastic as we removed from the box. We had to hang it in a remodeled guest bath as guests were to use the bathroom during their stay. I should have read the reviews before purchasing. I expect Amazon or the manufacturer to contact me asap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BOMINICA Rectangular Wall Mirror Framed Wall Mirror 16” x 20” for Bathroom
reviews.reviewText: Perfect for what we needed it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars one of two mirrors that I purchased was broken when I opened the cardboard shipping box.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered two of these mirrors for a home restoration project that I was working on.. When I finally got around to opening the boxes that they were shipped in I found one of them was cracked right across the middle. Not sure how this happened as the mirrors seem to be very well packaged and there was no dents or creases on/in the box externally. Seems that I will need to purchase another one to replace the broken one, as I am at this pint beyond the date of the return window; they sat around for a few months before my project was ready for me to try and make use of them..
